short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a random funny Chuck Norris fact!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lighten up your day by getting a random Chuck Norris fact!

This extension uses the Chuck Norris API: https://api.chucknorris.io/
which was built by Mathias Schilling: https://github.com/matchilling
